OverlayRules.title: Do you wish to download your photo to your phone?
OverlayRules.message: Any photo taken by the Photo Booth is automatically deleted after 5 minutes.

OverlayQrcode.title: Scan the QR code with your phone
OverlayQrcode.message:
1. Open the phone’s camera

2. Hold the camera in front of the QR code until it is scanned.

3. Press “Connect” to connect to the PhotoBooth’s local hotspot.

4. Wait until the pop-up window shows up. This may take up to 10 seconds.

5. Hold your finger on the photo and save it!

OverlayLoading.title: Loading picture...
OverlayLoading.message: Please wait. It may take a few seconds.

WelcomeWidget.message:
Strike a pose in front of the camera
 and have fun!

Press the button to begin

main_window.message: Choose a filter, then press the button and pose!
